config.customizations.name: Customizations
config.customizations.tips.addCustomizat:
Start by clicking the + sign below to add a Customization
Then click to expand the Customization and add Triggers, Conditions, and Actions for it
config.customizations.tips.lists: Lists like these can be used to add, remove, and rename sections
config.customizations.tips.customization: Each Customization needs at least 1 Trigger and 1 Action
config.customizations.debugMode.name: Debug Mode
config.customizations.debugMode.off.name: Off
config.customizations.debugMode.detailed: Logs when Customizations are triggered, tested, and activated
config.customizations.triggers.name: Triggers
config.customizations.triggers.tooltip: Triggers control when this Customization activates
config.customizations.triggers.breakBloc: Triggers when a block is broken
config.customizations.triggers.killEntit: Triggers when an entity is killed
Under what conditions should this Customization activate?
config.customizations.conditions.name: Conditions
config.customizations.conditions.tooltip: Conditions control specific conditions needed for this Customization to activate
Has a random chance to activate
config.customizations.actions.name: Actions
config.customizations.actions.tooltip: Actions control what this Customization does
config.customizations.actions.consoleMes: Send a message in the console / logs
config.customizations.actions.serverComm: Send a command from the server
config.customizations.actions.playerComm: Send a command from a player
config.customizations.misc.none.name: None
config.customizations.misc.any.name: Any
config.customizations.entity.name: Entity
config.customizations.entity.tooltip: Select what entity this applies to
config.customizations.entity.cause.name: Cause Entity
config.customizations.entity.cause.toolt: The entity that caused the trigger
config.customizations.entity.target.name: Target Entity
config.customizations.entity.target.tool: The entity that the trigger targets
config.customizations.entity.nearest.too: The entity nearest to a position
config.customizations.position.name: Position
config.customizations.position.cause.too: The position of the entity that caused the trigger
config.customizations.position.target.to: The position of the entity that the trigger targets
config.customizations.part.block.name: Block
config.customizations.part.block.tooltip: Block that this applies to; set to air to apply to all blocks
config.customizations.part.consoleMessag: Message that will be sent to the console / logs
config.customizations.part.random.name: Chance
config.customizations.part.random.toolti: % chance that this Customization will activate
config.customizations.part.command.name: Command
config.customizations.part.uuid.name: UUID
config.customizations.part.radius.name: Radius
config.customizations.part.radius.toolti: Radius around this position to look for entities
